message.claimRewardMessage1: Your rewards will be staked back into the pool after claiming
message.claimRewardMessage2: Your rewards will be added to your transferable balance after claiming
message.deleteNetworkMessage: You are about to delete this network
message.deleteTokenMessage: You are about to delete this token
message.deleteNftMessage: You are about to delete this NFT collection
message.unBondMessage: Once unbonded, your funds would be available for withdrawal after {0}.
message.applyDoneMessage: You have successfully updated master password to all accounts
message.transactionSubmitMessage: Track transaction progress in the History tab or go back to home
message.requestCreateMasterPassword: Your master password is the password that allows access to multiple accounts. Once a master password is confirmed, you will not need to manually type your password with every transaction.
message.transactionDoneMessage: Your request has been sent. You can track its progress on the Transaction History page.
message.buyMessage: You will be directed to the chosen supplier to complete this transaction
message.changeMasterPasswordMessage1: To create a new password, you must correctly enter your current password.
message.changeMasterPasswordMessage2: Use this password to unlock your account.
message.forgotPasswordMessage: We do not keep your password. If you forgot your password, you will need to reset your wallet using the Secret Recovery Phrase
message.disconnectModalMessage: Once you disconnect, you will no longer see this connection on SubWallet and on your DApp.
message.connectWalletConnectMessage: By clicking "Connect", you allow this dapp to view your public address
message.noticeForNewLoginMethod: For easier password management, master password will be applied in place of PIN code in previous versions. You need to enter your master password to unlock SubWallet.
message.migrateMasterPasswordForBiometric: For easier password management, master password will be applied in place of PIN code in previous versions. To keep using biometric authentication, please enter your master password and verify your biometric again.
message.xcmTransferWarningMessage: You'll need to pay an additional fee for the destination network in a cross-chain transfer. This fee cannot be calculated in advance.
message.generalTermWarning: Make sure to tick the checkbox "I understand and agree to the Terms of Use, which apply to my use of SubWallet and all of its feature" to be able to click Continue
message.masterPasswordWarning: Make sure to tick the checkbox "I understand that SubWallet can\'t recover the password for me" to be able to click Continue

warningTitle.whatIfLoseRecoveryPhrase: What if I lose the seed phrase?

warningMessage.secretPhraseWarning: There is no way to get back your recovery phrase if you lose it. Make sure you store them at someplace safe which is accessible only to you.
warningMessage.unableDecode: Unable to decode using the supplied passphrase
warningMessage.isNotSameAddressAndTokenType: Transfer is not supported for this type of account and token
warningMessage.initSecretPhrase: Keep your seed phrase in a safe place, and never disclose it. Anyone with this phrase can take control of your assets.
warningMessage.noEvmAccountMessage: You don't have any evm account. Please create, import or restore an account to continue
warningMessage.noSubstrateAccountMessage: You don't have any substrate account. Please create, import or restore an account to continue
warningMessage.trustSiteMessage: Make sure you trust this site before connecting.
warningMessage.ethSignWarningMessage: Signing this message can be dangerous. This signature could potentially perform any operation on your account's behalf, including granting complete control of your account and all of its assets to the requesting site. Only sign this message if you know what you're doing or completely trust the requesting site.
warningMessage.clearHistoryWarningMessage: Make sure you want to clear all history
warningMessage.phishingMessage: This site is blocked because the SubWallet app believes that this website could compromise the security of your accounts and your tokens.
warningMessage.balanceTooLow: Your balance is too low to cover fees
warningMessage.thresholdLagerThan: The threshold must be larger than

warningMessage.webRunnerDeadMessage: We've run into an issue. Please try again later or restart the application
warningMessage.unSupportSigning: This feature is not available for the chosen account

warningMessage.featureIsNotAvailable: This feature is not available for the chosen account
warningMessage.enableNetworkMessage: The network you selected has not enable. Please enable by click this button or choose other network
warningMessage.expiredConnectionMessage: Connection expired. Please create a new connection from dApp
warningMessage.unsupportedNetworkMessage: There is at least 1 chosen network unavailable
warningMessage.insufficientBalanceMessage: Your available balance is {0} {1}, you need to leave {2} {1} as minimal balance (existential deposit) and pay network fees. Make sure you have at least {3} {1} in your transferable balance to proceed.
warningMessage.insufficientBalanceMessageV2: Insufficient balance. Amount must be smaller than available balance
warningMessage.crossChainTransferWarningMessage: Cross-chain transfer to an exchange (CEX) will result in loss of funds. Make sure the receiving address is not an exchange address.
warningMessage.enterAstarPortalMessage: Navigate to Astar portal to view and manage your stake in Astar dApp staking v3
warningMessage.reCheckInternetConnection: Check your connection and try again
